name: Soccer Shoot: USA Edition
description:
Goal, goal, goal! Are you ready to shoot and beat the opponent goalkeeper and show off your soccer player skills?

Score as many goals as you can in this amazing game! Throw the fouls and practice through different levels and become the most pro shooter among your friends! The goalkeeper is hard to beat so you will need to put in practice all your skills to get the three stars in every level.

Get ready, concentrate and kick the soccer ball! You can shoot with different effects and trajectories so make sure the goalkeeper do not stop your shoots. Play with the players of the best league in the US and all its stars! Become the most valuable player for the scouts and do not stop shooting goals and fouls!

Complete all the levels of the first tournament to unlock the Cup that will take you to the stars of the soccer stadiums in the US. Win all the money you can to buy different accessories that will help you to boost your skills and reach the top of this soccer game! Hear this whole stadium of the US claiming the name of their favorite player! You!

Enjoy now the different game modes: targets, barriers, penalties, free kicks, boxes! Complete missions and collect all the pack items to improve your skills! Live the thrills of one of the best soccer leagues in the US!

Features of this soccer game in the US:
- Realistic kick controls and effects!
- Amazing animations and high definition graphics!
- Statistics charts. Check your progress in real time!
- Easy controls, you just need to swipe your finger in the screen to shoot!
- Become the best player and beat the goalkeeper with your goals!

Do you think you have what is needed to score all the required goals and get to the top? The most famous soccer players are waiting for you! Take your football shoes and start to shoot! Score the goal of your life! Play now!
